Had that problem too, re-installed the game and it worked. If only i was able to save my game..

To save your game go into the WL cloud and make a new profile button. Scroll to the bottom of the text and click the blue "Make local account" text and it'll work.

I've just been punched in the face by the game. I was close to the end, after a really climactic scene and I tried to save after regaining control only to be told the game "failed to retrieve saved games list" all the saves were gone, I couldn't save, the game quit and now it won't come back. Every time I boot it up the screen blackens, the arrow appears and soon after it closes to desktop. NEED HELP!!

Nevermind, seems to be a common problem and found a fix on a forum, unfortunately I'll now have to start over from the beginning. 

Note to everyone getting this game, quicksave can corrupt and cause this error, manual save to avoid!
Everything solved for me now, awesome game. Thx!
